    • Method Detail

      • medianAbsoluteDeviationOfGradient

        public static double medianAbsoluteDeviationOfGradient(ImageTTAA img)
        Computes the median absolute deviation of the gradient in an image. Sums the values over the RGB channel results (because it is a deviation). Can be used to set the K value in Perona-Malik non-linear anisotropic diffusion.
        Parameters:
        img -
        Returns:

      • medianAbsoluteDeviationOfGradient

        public static double medianAbsoluteDeviationOfGradient(LayeredMatrix img)
        Computes the median absolute deviation of the gradient in an image. Sums the values over the RGB channel results (because it is a deviation). Can be used to set the K value in Perona-Malik non-linear anisotropic diffusion.
        Parameters:
        img -
        Returns:
